addClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,addres.details: Only callable by a policy admin. The policy must not be cemented.

params._subscriber: The address to add to the policy subscription.

createForeignCall(uint256,(bool,address,.details: Builds a foreign call structure and maps it to the associated policy ID.

params._foreignCall: The definition of the foreign call to create.
params._policyId: The policy ID the foreign call will be mapped to.

returns._0: The index of the created foreign call.

createFunctionSignature(uint256,bytes4,u.details: Associates the function signature with the specified policy ID and parameter types.

params._pTypes: The parameter types for the function signature.
params._policyId: The policy ID the function signature is associated with.

returns._0: functionId The index of the created function signature.

createTracker(uint256,(bool,uint8,bytes,.details: Creates a new tracker and associates it with the specified policy ID.

params._policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.

returns._0: trackerIndex The index of the created tracker.

params._foreignCallId: The ID of the foreign call to delete.
params._policyId: The policy ID the foreign call is associated with.

deleteFunctionSignature(uint256,uint256).details: Removes the function signature and its associated rules and mappings.

params._functionSignatureId: The ID of the function signature to delete.
params._policyId: The policy ID the function signature is associated with.
The policy ID the tracker is associated with.
params._trackerIndex: The index of the tracker to delete.

getAllForeignCalls(uint256).details: Retrieve Foreign Call Set from storage

params._policyId: the policy Id of the foreign call to retrieve
The policy ID the function signatures are associated with.

returns._0: functionSignatureStorageSets An array of function signature data.

params._policyId: The policy ID the trackers are associated with.

returns._0: trackers An array of tracker data.

params._foreignCallId: The ID of the foreign call to retrieve.
params._policyId: The policy ID of the foreign call to retrieve.

params._functionSignatureId: The ID of the function signature to retrieve.
params._policyId: The policy ID the function signature is associated with.

params._index: The index of the tracker to retrieve.
params._policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.

returns._cemented: True if the policy is cemented, false otherwise.

params._subscriber: The address to check for policy subscription.

returns._0: bool True if the address is a subscriber, false otherwise.

removeClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,add.details: Only callable by a policy admin. The policy must not be cemented.

params._subscriber: The address to remove from the policy subscription.

params._foreignCallId: The ID of the foreign call to update.
params._policyId: The policy ID the foreign call is associated with.

updateFunctionSignature(uint256,uint256,.details: Ensures that the new parameter types are compatible with the existing ones.

params._functionSignatureId: The ID of the function signature to update.
params._pTypes: The new parameter types to append.
params._policyId: The policy ID the function signature is associated with.

returns._0: functionId The updated function signature ID.

updateTracker(uint256,uint256,(bool,uint.details: Modifies the tracker associated with the specified policy ID and tracker index.

params._policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.
params._trackerIndex: The index of the tracker to update.

addClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,addres.notice: Adds an address to the subscriber list of a specified policy.

createForeignCall(uint256,(bool,address,.notice: Creates a foreign call and stores it in the contract's storage.

createFunctionSignature(uint256,bytes4,u.notice: Creates a new function signature and stores it in the function signature storage mapping.

createTracker(uint256,(bool,uint8,bytes,.notice: Adds a tracker to the tracker storage mapping.

deleteForeignCall(uint256,uint256).notice: Deletes a foreign call from the contract's storage.

deleteFunctionSignature(uint256,uint256).notice: Deletes a function signature from storage.

deleteTracker(uint256,uint256).notice: Deletes a tracker from the tracker storage mapping.

getAllFunctionSignatures(uint256).notice: Retrieves all function signatures associated with a specific policy ID.

getAllTrackers(uint256).notice: Retrieves all trackers associated with a specific policy ID.

getForeignCall(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves a foreign call from the contract's storage.

getFunctionSignature(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves a function signature from storage.

getTracker(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves a tracker from the tracker storage mapping.

isCemented(uint256).notice: Checks if a policy is cemented.

isClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,address.notice: Checks if an address is a subscriber of the specified policy.

removeClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,add.notice: Removes an address from the subscriber list of a specified policy.

updateForeignCall(uint256,uint256,(bool,.notice: Updates a foreign call in the contract's storage.

updateFunctionSignature(uint256,uint256,.notice: Updates an existing function signature by appending new parameter types.

updateTracker(uint256,uint256,(bool,uint.notice: Updates an existing tracker in the tracker storage mapping.
